title: Failure to obey order or regulation
context: [ยง124A-127] Failure to obey order or regulation. Any person subject to this chapter who: (1) Violates or fails to obey any lawful general order or regulation; (2) Having knowledge of any other lawful order issued by a member of the state military forces which it is the person&rsquo;s duty to obey, fails to obey the order; or (3) Is derelict in the performance of the person&rsquo;s duties; shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
